root.name: Code Lyoko: Fall of XANA
root.description: Code Lyoko: Fall of X.A.N.A. is the French animated series' second offering for the Nintendo DS, rejoining the Lyoko Warriors in their efforts to contain the killer artificial intelligence X.A.N.A. following the original NDS game...and a 12-episode animation season not adapted into game events. Fall of X.A.N.A. encompasses an alternate version of Season 4, in the same timeframe as Quest For Infinity for the Wii, Playstation 2, and Playstation Portable.Unlike its platformer brethren, Fall of X.A.N.A. uses the DS's touchscreen exclusively - movement, encounter commands, and between-level interaction at Kadic Academy are all dictated by the touch of the stylus. The game continues the series' tradition, however, of punctuating events with FMV clips of the cartoon (though lacking the voice support of Quest For Infinity).
